columns.name: control_id
columns.description: The identifier of the security standard control.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The ARN of the security standard control.

columns.name: control_status
columns.description: The current status of the security standard control. Indicates whether the control is enabled or disabled. Security Hub does not check against disabled controls.

columns.name: severity_rating
columns.description: The severity of findings generated from this security standard control.

columns.name: control_status_updated_at
columns.description: The date and time that the status of the security standard control was most recently updated.

columns.name: description
columns.description: The longer description of the security standard control.

columns.name: disabled_reason
columns.description: The reason provided for the most recent change in status for the control.

columns.name: remediation_url
columns.description: A link to remediation information for the control in the Security Hub user documentation.

columns.name: related_requirements
columns.description: The list of requirements that are related to this control.
